content.query:
CREATE TABLE [Topic].[NATO_Topics]
( 
	[id] bigint  NULL,
	[created_at] DATETIME2(7)  NULL,
	[text] NVARCHAR(4000)  NULL,
	[lang] nvarchar(10)  NULL,
	[retweet_count] INT  NULL,
	[reply_count] INT  NULL,
	[like_count] INT  NULL,
	[quote_count] INT  NULL,
	[impression_count] INT  NULL,
    [Topic] INT NULL,
    [Topic 0 Confidence] REAL NULL,
    [Topic 1 Confidence] REAL NULL,
    [Topic 2 Confidence] REAL NULL,
    [Topic 3 Confidence] REAL NULL,
    [Topic 4 Confidence] REAL NULL
)

GO
